author: xtqqczze
body:
This has occurred previously, see #12665 (v7.1.0-preview.2)

IMO there should be a "merge branch 'release/v7.1.0-preview.4' into master" step in the release process.

comments.author: iSazonov
comments.body: The Preview4 is broken and obsolete. After a fix new Preview5 will be pulled.

title: Changelog for v7.1.0-preview.4 is missing from master
